swiper_1.title: The best oil
swiper_1.first_paragraph: At Inducítrica, we don't go out to buy lemons: the lemons are ours. We are
swiper_1.second_paragraph: the leading lemon exporter in Argentina.

swiper_2.title: Without a planet,
swiper_2.first_paragraph: At Inducítrica, we preserve the native piedmont, we build a
swiper_2.second_paragraph: reservoir for irrigation and measure our carbon footprint.

swiper_3.first_paragraph: At Inducítrica, our fields breathe the fertile air of Tucumán, in Argentina;
swiper_3.second_paragraph: one of the best regions in the world for citrus.
